page.title: 18NEW HOUSING QUARRINGTON AREA
page.content: Most of our D block is{farmland}but there are new{houses}and{bungalows being built in{Quarrington. Bill {Jackson's Development Ltd}is one of the{estates}being developed in{New {Quarrington.}In l98l 72{houses}were built on a piece of{farmland.}Many were sold to people moving away from areas like{London}where property is expensive. Some houses were sold to {RAF personnel.}In{Quarrington}there is a pleasant{estate}of 36 3 bedroomed bungalows. The gardens and properties are well maintained. In the l970's and l980's{Silk Willoughby}was expanded with the building of l6{council {dwellings}in Gorse Lane, and a new {sewage scheme.}Then came 23 private dwellings in Rowan Drive,l0 bungalows in Gorse Lane, ll in Willoughby Close, l0 in School Lane and 6 individual properties around the village.
